script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Next up we have Andrea, a Google Data Engineer from London, but originally from Milan, Italy. Now, Andrea has a special someone he'd like to dedicate this performance to. He'll be sharing his own acoustic rendition of a Michael Jackson classic, and it's all for our very own Sara Bareilles!  Andrea, let's see if you can win her heart.

script.speaker: Participant
script.text: START PERFORMANCE - Andrea performs an acoustic version of "Billie Jean" by Michael Jackson.

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: Well, well, well! Looks like we've got a love story brewing on stage tonight! Not bad, Andrea, not bad at all. You've got guts, I'll give you that.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: Ha! You went there, man!  I dig the acoustic take on MJ, though.  Takes some serious confidence to strip down a legend like that.

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: There's a vulnerability in your voice, Andrea, that really resonates. You poured your heart into that performance.  Raw and real.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, that was incredibly sweet of you.  A girl always appreciates a good MJ cover.  You've got a lovely voice.

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: So, Andrea, you've bared your soul on stage tonight.  Judges, what do you say?  Will his Google's Got Talent journey continue?

script.speaker: Billie Joe Armstrong
script.text: You know, I gotta hand it to him, that took some serious guts. He's got passion, and that's punk rock in my book. It's a yes from me.

script.speaker: Dave Grohl
script.text: I'm with Billie on this one.  Dude's got heart.  Plus, anyone who risks it all for love gets a yes from me.  You never know, right?

script.speaker: Alanis Morissette
script.text: Andrea, your sincerity touched me.  It's a yes.  Keep following your heart, in music and in life.

script.speaker: Sara Bareilles
script.text: Andrea, you've got talent, and that was a very sweet gesture. It's a yes from me.  Though I'm not making any promises about that date!

script.speaker: Sundar Pichai
script.text: Four yeses! Andrea, you've won over the judges with your heartfelt performance. Congratulations, you're moving on to the next round!
